price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ យើងបានបញ្ចុះគម្ពីរគួរអាន ហើយពិត ប្រាកដណាស់ យើងជាអ្នកថែរក្សាវា។
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَٰفِظُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā al-dhik'ra wa-innā lahu laḥāfiẓūna
